dublin_core.dcvalue: Given the power and pervasiveness of technology this paper considers whether it can help doctors to access use and share knowledge and thus contribute to their ability to uphold the part of the Hippocratic Oath concerned with respecting the hard won scientific gains of those physicians in whose steps I walk and sharing such knowledge as is mine with those who are to follow How technology supports connections between doctors and knowledge is considered by focusing on the use of mobile technology in the workplace and Web 2 0 tools
Does technology help doctors to access, use and share knowledge?
